alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Volusia County through 500 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pierson, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pierson, Barberville and Eldridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
